definition: a party (in a contract or legal case)/one side/area/region
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
(of relatives or friends) to live far apart from each other
to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc)/to hold as one's personal fiefdom

sentences.english: You may vote who sever side you like.
sentences.chinese: 你可以投票选你喜欢的任一方。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the cost of maintaining social order is rising.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，维护社会秩序的成本在上升。

sentences.english: Each side tries to anticipate the actions of the other.
sentences.chinese: 每一方都试图预测另一方的行动。

sentences.english: Each side tries to anticipate the actions of the other.
sentences.chinese: 每一方都试图预测另一方的行动。

sentences.english: Did either party emphasize the relationship as much as the settlement?
sentences.chinese: 有认何一方把结果等同于关系来重视呢？

sentences.english: Lack of knowledge, on the other hand, can be deadly.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，缺乏知识可能是致命的。

sentences.english: On the other hand, you might get ripped off since you don't know the seller .
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，你可能会被敲竹杠，因为你不知道卖方。

sentences.english: When making a phone call, which side have to hang up first?
sentences.chinese: 打电话时，应由哪一方先挂断？

sentences.english: Getting it to civilization is another.
sentences.chinese: 让它融入现代文明是另一方面。

sentences.english: Signification, on the other hand, comes into play in the Vorstellung.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，真实意义是在观念的领域运作。

sentences.english: For another, there are also some differences between high school life and college school.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，高中生活和大学又有所不同。

sentences.english: Individual investors, on the other hand, are not so surprised at Hou's hasty retreat.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，散户们对侯宁的急流勇退并不感觉奇怪。

sentences.english: For one thing ， urgent measures are required to resolve problems involving state-owned enterprises .
sentences.chinese: 一方面，需要紧要方法解决涉及国有企业的问题。

sentences.english: Except for one of the sexes in one situation.
sentences.chinese: 而在某一情况下，两性其中一方的选择比较不一样。

sentences.english: The next area to question is the whelping of the puppies.
sentences.chinese: 问题的另一方面就是幼崽的。

sentences.english: Another dimension to consider is how variable the service invocation is.
sentences.chinese: 要考虑的另一方面是调用服务的变数。

definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
both sides (in contract)/the two opposing sides (in a dispute)

unilateral/one-sided/home remedy/folk prescription(same as 丹方)/single-drug prescription (same as 奇方[ji1 fang1], one of the seven kinds of prescriptions of Chinese medicine 七方[qi1 fang1])/metaphorically. a good solution
to move aside/to get out of the way/to back down/to concede
to concede/to give in/to yield/a concession/(linguistics) concessive
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
